_meta.description: Bar chart configuration for Arcanomy Motion video generation
_meta.outputPath: Renders to same directory as input JSON (e.g., bar-chart-basic.mp4)
_meta.fonts: Uses Google Fonts: Montserrat (bold headlines), Inter (clean body text)
_meta.transparency: Set background.color to 'transparent' and render with ProRes for alpha channel
_meta.IMPORTANT_FOR_AGENTS: All _*_desc fields are inline documentation - read them to understand each setting

_chartType_desc: Chart type: 'bar' for vertical bar chart

dimensions._desc: 1080x1080 square format for maximum TikTok compatibility

margin._desc: Margins sized for large mobile-friendly fonts
margin._top_desc: Extra space at top - easy to crop title if needed

background._desc: Background color. Use '#00FF00' (green) for chroma key removal in video editors like CapCut
background._color_desc: GREEN SCREEN: Use '#00FF00' then apply 'Chroma Key' in CapCut to make transparent. Other options: '#000000' (black), 'transparent' (only works with ProRes)

title._desc: Large, bold title for mobile readability
title._text_desc: Keep titles short for square format
title._y_desc: Vertical position from top in pixels (lower = higher on screen)

font._size_desc: LARGE for mobile - must be readable at a glance

subtitle._text_desc: Keep short - less space in square format
subtitle._y_desc: Vertical position from top in pixels

bars._desc: Bar styling optimized for square format
bars._defaultColor_desc: Gold - high visibility on dark background

font._family_desc: Arcanomy brand font - bold for emphasis

animation._duration_desc: Base duration in frames (30 = 1 sec). SHORTEST bar uses this; taller bars take longer if velocityMode=true
animation._velocityMode_desc: true = taller bars take longer (builds suspense). false = all bars finish together
animation._staggerDelay_desc: Frames between each bar START. For 'staggered': adds extra pause. For 'wave': controls overlap
